column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////plenty of pastries that my friends said were super flakey and good (didn't get one myself
column2: not a pastry person). I ordered the sausage and egg sandwich
column4: albeit on the pricier side (~$12). My friends also enjoyed their quiches and lox
column5: but everyone said their pastries stole the show.
